item.title: Trump Appears on Live Camera at End of White House Press Conference, Dispelling Speculation About His Health
item.description: September 3rd. Towards the end of a White House press briefing, President Trump emerged on live camera to quash speculation regarding his health. During the first half of today's White House press briefing, live broadcasts from major U.S. mainstream media outlets like Fox News, NBC, CNBC, etc. presented the exterior of the White House without showing President Trump at the briefing. Recent social media has been in full swing with speculation about his health.

item.title: If Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative long liquidation strength of major CEXs will reach $1.53 billion.
item.description: On September 3rd, the cryptocurrency market remains on a downward trajectory. According to Coinglass data, in the event that Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation in mainstream CEXs will reach $1.553 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum surges above $4400, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation in mainstream CEXs will reach $0.940 billion.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not precisely depict the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent clusters, that is, intensity. Consequently, the liquidation chart showcases the degree to which the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it attains a certain level. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that when the price reaches that level, it will experience a more pronounced reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Trump: Losing the Tariff Appeal Would Be an Economic Disaster
item.description: On September 3rd, President Trump of the US stated that if he lost the tariff appeal, it would be an economic disaster. An "emergency meeting" is going to be held tomorrow regarding the tariff ruling.

item.title: Trump Shows Up at White House Press Briefing as Scheduled, But Does Not Appear on Camera Live
item.description: September 3rd. President Trump was present at the White House press briefing as scheduled at 2 a.m. today. It is noteworthy that up to now, live broadcasts from major U.S. media outlets such as Fox News, NBC, CNBC, etc., only display the exterior of the White House and have not shown Trump's attendance at the briefing.In recent days, there has been extensive speculation on social media regarding his health condition. On August 30th, Pence stated that if a "serious tragedy" were to occur to Trump, he would be prepared to assume the presidency. Subsequently, Pence mentioned that the 79-year-old Trump is in good health and, despite recent inquiries about his health, he still retains "remarkable energy."

item.title: Trump: Will Appeal Tariff Ruling, To Hold "Emergency Meeting" Tomorrow on Tariff Ruling
item.description: September 3rd: President Trump declared that he will file an appeal regarding the tariff ruling.Trump emphasized once again that global tariffs pose an economic emergency and that "if the tariff war fails to achieve victory, it will set off a chain reaction." An "emergency meeting" concerning the tariff ruling will be held tomorrow.BlockBeats had previously reported that on August 31st, U.S. Trade Representative Grille stated that after the tariff ruling (by a U.S. court), trade negotiations would continue.On June 2nd, Trump made remarks related to tariffs again, stating, "If the court in some manner issues a ruling on tariffs that is unfavorable to us (which is not anticipated), then other countries will take advantage of this situation to hold us hostage with anti-American tariffs and utilize these tariffs against us, which means the destruction of the U.S. economy!"The U.S. International Trade Court prohibited Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs from coming into effect, ruling

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Trend Continues, with CEX Net Outflow of 10,600 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 3rd, according to Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, the cumulative net outflow of CEX was 10,600 ETH. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:· Bitfinex, with an outflow of 14,500 ETH;· Binance, with an outflow of 6,437.45 ETH;· KuCoin, with an outflow of 1,028.80 ETH.In addition, Bybit witnessed an inflow of 8,572.40 ETH and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: OpenAI is investing $1.1 billion to acquire Statsig.
item.description: On Tuesday, September 3rd, the artificial intelligence giant OpenAI confirmed that it is carrying out an executive team reorganization. A new role of Application Chief Technology Officer is established. OpenAI also acquired the product analytics company Statsig for $1.1 billion. Statsig, the acquired company, specializes in product optimization services such as A/B testing. Its founder and CEO, Vijaye Raji, will join OpenAI and report directly to the Application Business CEO Fidji Simo.Simo joined OpenAI after resigning from her position as the CEO of the grocery delivery platform Instacart on August 18th. In the announcement, OpenAI stated that after the completion of the transaction, Statsig employees will join the OpenAI team. The company will continue to operate independently and serve existing customers from its Seattle headquarters. (Jinse)

item.title: Reflect has completed a $3.75 million funding round led by a16z crypto, and will launch an income-generating stablecoin, USDC+.
item.description: On September 3rd, the stablecoin protocol Reflect successfully completed a financing round of $3.75 million. a16z crypto took the lead in this round, and Solana Ventures, Equilibrium, Colosseum, and Big Brain Holdings also participated. Reflect is going to launch a new flagship yield-stablecoin, USDC+, on the Solana blockchain.

item.title: Spot Gold Surges Above $3530/oz, Continues to Hit All-Time Highs
item.description: September 3rd, the spot gold surged above $3530/oz and hit another record high. It rose by more than $50 intra-day, with a 1.54% increase. (Oriental Wealth)

item.title: Anthropic has completed a $1.3 billion new funding round, propelling it to the world's highest valued AI startup.
item.description: On September 3rd, the artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced that it has recently completed a financing round of $13 billion, with its valuation soaring to $183 billion. This financing, which far exceeded expectations, has made it one of the world's most highly valued startups. The round was led by Iconiq Capital, with Fidelity Management and Research Company, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Singapore's GIC, Insight Partners, and the Qatar Investment Authority (QIA) participating.According to previous reports, Anthropic's initial target was to raise $5 billion, which was later increased to $10 billion, and finally reached $13 billion. In a statement on Tuesday, Anthropic said that this investment "validates Anthropic's unprecedented growth rate and solidifies our position as the preferred intelligent platform for enterprises, developers, and high-end users."
